column5: From myself (Steve), Kristi, Cooper and "The Bump (June 07)" we all wish you Merry Christmas.  We will be having a "Bump" naming auction for all you wanting your name in the spotlight...hahahahaaa  Have a GREAT holiday, please don't Drink and Drive.
Great pic PF, here's to you and yours for a great christmas. Take care now.
I hope you all have a great xmas.  Keep an eye out for the fat guy in the red suit.  Pam
Merry Christmas to you & yours too PF, and all the best in the NewYear  Beautiful family picture too
PF- Merry Christmas to you and your family!  - Steven
Wonderful looking family.  Boy will Christmas be exciting at your place this year!
Have a safe and happy holiday season Steve.
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you and your family Pigeonfisher.  Tom.

Pidge that is awesome... merry HOHO to you and the family and the soon to be addition...  I got $5.00 name him Gerritt!!!  Ohh and take it EASY on the Egg Nog... I know you cant handle your liquor LOL   Gerritt
That's a great picture Steve.  Very nice family indeed.  How'd you get so lucky  Merry Christmas!  Joey & Tybo
Merry Christmas to you and your family Steve. I hope you have a great Christmas.  Mike
Merry Christmas to you and your family Steve. And that is great news about the upcoming baby!! WTG Kristi !!
